title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When a file is already open in the editor, selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' from the context menu of the file in the Navigator has no effect.
EB: When selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' for a file that is already open, a new editor of different type should be opened for the file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named test.xml.
3. The file should open in the scripted resource editor example which ignores the XML content.
4. In the Navigator, select test.xml.
5. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'.
6. Verify that nothing happens and the scripted resource editor example remains the active editor for the file.

To verify the fix:
1. Repeat the above steps.
3. When selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor', a new editor of different type should open for the file.
